mapper.select: select st.teacher_id as teaId,st.teacher_name as name,sc.class_name as className,st.teacher_password as password, st.teacher_sex as sex,st.teacher_birthday as birthday from school_teacher st left join school_class as sc on sc.class_id=st.pk_class_id and st.is_deleted=0 where st.is_deleted=0 order by st.teacher_id
